annotations: I spent 31 years at Campbell City Schools.
I was a bus driver, van driver and dispatcher.
I ran the office, answering phone calls, updating routes and solving problems that would come up with parents and others.
I worked hard to keep the field trips running smoothly. I added new students to routes and deleted or changed addresses as needed.
I handled ordering the necessary parts, as well as services necessary to keep the fleet up and running.

I handled filing and many issues that needed addressed and had the ability to remain calm and speak calmly to parents who were upset. It was important to make quick and successful decisions to deal with issues, insuring the continued operation of transportation.
I have a CDL with a passenger endorsement, a van endorsement, as well as a educational aide certification.
I have a clean driving record with no accidentâ€™s or tickets in over 20 years.
I am looking to work on a part time basis and truly feel I have a lot of experience that would benefit any organization that would consider employing me.
